Sections.Name: CautiousTravel
Sections.Description: Configuration for the Cautious Travel option. If enabled, it provides time accelerated travel at a speed penalty, but with the benefit of a chance to avoid random encounters based on luck plus Stealth, as well as health monitoring.

Keys.Name: PlayerControlledCautiousTravel
Keys.Description: Enables the travel option "Cautiously" to initiate time accelerated travel, instead of vanilla fast travel

Keys.Name: SpeedPenalty
Keys.Description: Speed penalty for travelling cautiously, as a percentage

Keys.Name: MaxChanceToAvoidEncounter
Keys.Description: Maximum chance to avoid an encounter when travelling cautiously, as a percentage

Keys.Name: HealthMinimumPercentage
Keys.Description: Level of health that will automatically pause the journey when travelling cautiously, as a percentage

Keys.Name: FatigueMinimumValue
Keys.Description: Level of fatigue that will automatically pause the journey when travelling cautiously, absolute value

Sections.Name: StopAtInnsTravel
Sections.Description: Configuration for the Stop At Inns Travel option. If enabled, this effectively disables normal fast traveling completely, except when sailing.

Keys.Name: PlayerControlledInnsTravel
Keys.Description: Enables the stop for night travel option "Inns" to initiate time accelerated travel, instead of fast travel

Sections.Name: ShipTravel
Sections.Description: Configuration for the Ship Travel option and the port restrictions applied to it.

Keys.Name: OnlyFromPorts
Keys.Description: Restricts ship travel to be possible only from places with ports

Keys.Name: OnlyToPorts
Keys.Description: Restricts ship travel to be possible only if destination has a port, if from ports setting is enabled

Sections.Name: GeneralOptions
Sections.Description: Configuration for general travel options to suit each player and system setup. For discovery and exploration also allow travel to any map coordinates and auto-pausing travel wwhen at or near locations.

Keys.Name: AllowTargetingMapCoordinates
Keys.Description: Allows travel map to target any coordinates using time accelerated travel

Keys.Name: LocationPause
Keys.Description: Auto pause when encountering a game location during real time accelerated travel

Keys.Name: AllowWeather
Keys.Description: Allows weather effects during time accelerated travel

Keys.Name: AllowAnnoyingSounds
Keys.Description: Allows footstep and hoof sounds during time accelerated travel

Keys.Name: AllowRealGrass
Keys.Description: Allows the Real Grass mod to run during time accelerated travel

Keys.Name: DefaultStartingAcceleration
Keys.Description: The initial time acceleration used after starting the game

Keys.Name: AlwaysUseStartingAcceleration
Keys.Description: Always uses the default starting acceleration when initiating a journey, rather than value from the previous journey

Keys.Name: AccelerationLimit
Keys.Description: The maximum limit allowed for time acceleration, road following is limited to half this amount

Sections.Name: Teleportation
Sections.Description: Allows the mages guild teleportation service to be availible to all members regardless of rank, at a cost of course. Becomes free once reaching rank it was originally availible.

Keys.Name: EnablePaidTeleportation
Keys.Description: Enable paid Mages teleportation service for all guild members, before rank 8

Sections.Name: RoadsIntegration
Sections.Description: Configuration for integration of the BasicRoads mod, if it's installed

Keys.Name: Enable
Keys.Description: Enhances the travel map with larger location dots for cities & towns, and shows roads & tracks with toggle buttons

Keys.Name: VariableSizeDots
Keys.Description: All locations, except for cities & towns, are rendered as smaller dots

Keys.Name: FollowPathsKey
Keys.Description: Sets the key to initiate time accelerated travelling following paths if roads integration enabled

Keys.Name: FollowPathsCustomKeyBind
Keys.Description: Custom key bind for following paths used if CustomBind set above

Keys.Name: EnableWaterways
Keys.Description: Enhances the travel map with rivers and streams with a toggle button

Keys.Name: EnableStreamsToggle
Keys.Description: Adds a streams toggle button separate from rivers button

Keys.Name: MarkLocationColor
Keys.Description: The colour used to highlight locations using middle mouse button on travel map

Sections.Name: RoadsJunctionMap
Sections.Description: Configure a mini-map that pops up at junctions when following roads. Can also be made to be persistent while following paths.

Keys.Name: Enable
Keys.Description: Enables the junction mini-map

Keys.Name: PersistentMap
Keys.Description: Set this to have the junction mini-map always displayed when following paths

Keys.Name: ScreenSize
Keys.Description: The width and height the mini-map is rendered on the screen

Keys.Name: ScreenPositionX
Keys.Description: The X coordinate the mini-map is rendered on the screen

Keys.Name: ScreenPositionY
Keys.Description: The Y coordinate the mini-map is rendered on the screen

Keys.Name: FilterMode
Keys.Description: Pixel filtering to use when rendering the mini-map

Keys.Name: Circular
Keys.Description: Draw the mini-map in a circle around the player

Keys.Name: PlayerColor
Keys.Description: The colour of the player position and direction indicator

Keys.Name: Opaque
Keys.Description: Render the mini-map with an opaque background color

Keys.Name: BackgroundColor
Keys.Description: The opaque background color to use for the mini-map
